name: Chimchar
description: Its backside is in flames. The flame burns weakly when it sleeps.

name: Pikachu
description: When it encounters something new, it shocks it with electricity.

name: Buizel
description: It inflates the flotation sac around its neck and pokes its head out of the water to see.

name: Linoone
description: It charges prey at speeds over 60 mph. However, because it can only run straight, it often fails.

name: Victini
description: This Pokémon brings victory. It is said that Trainers with Victini always win.

name: Shiftry
description: A Pokémon that was feared as a forest guardian. It can read the foe's mind and take preemptive action.

name: Croagunk
description: Inflating its poison sacs, it makes an eerie sound to intimidate opponents.

name: Gigalith
description: Compressing the energy from its internal core lets it fire off an attack capable of blowing away a mountain.

name: Gliscor
description: It observes prey while hanging inverted from branches. When the chance presents itself, it swoops!

name: Staraptor
description: It has a savage nature. It will courageously challenge foes that are much larger.

name: Crustle
description: Competing for territory, Crustle fight viciously. The one whose boulder is broken is the loser.

name: Crobat
description: Having four wings allows it to fly more quietly and faster than ever.

name: Darkrai
description: It can lull people to sleep and make them dream. It is active during nights of the new moon.

name: Giratina
description: A Pokémon that is said to live in a world on the reverse side of ours. It appears in an ancient cemetery.

name: Snorunt
description: It is said that a home visited by a Snorunt will prosper. It can handle snow of -150 degrees Fahrenheit.

name: Bastiodon
description: Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

name: Salamence
description: It becomes uncontrollable if it is enraged. It destroys everything with claws and fire.

name: Whimsicott
description: Like the wind, it can slip through any gap, no matter how small. It leaves balls of white fluff behind.
